The Radio 4YOU Chrome Extension is designed to offer users a seamless experience for listening to an online EDM radio stream directly from the browser. Below are its key functionalities and advantages:

Product Features:
Stream Playback and Control:

Users can play and pause the live radio stream directly from the extension popup.
Two different stream quality options (320 kbps and 128 kbps) are available, allowing users to switch based on their internet speed or preference.
A visual indicator shows which stream is currently active.
Volume Adjustment:

The extension features a volume slider for precise control, displayed as a tooltip with the percentage of the current volume.
Volume preferences are saved for future use, ensuring a consistent listening experience.
Track Display:

The extension fetches and displays the current track title in real-time, automatically updating every 10 seconds.
If the track name is too long to fit the display, a smooth scrolling animation is used for better readability.
Track History:

Users can view the last 10 tracks played on the station.
Clicking on a track in the history opens a Google search with more information, making it easy to explore previous tracks.
Track Search on Popular Platforms:

The extension includes search buttons for finding the current track on platforms like YouTube, Spotify, VK, SoundCloud, and more.
Users can instantly search the track on these platforms with a single click.
Custom Header Management:

The extension uses a custom header for requests to enhance compatibility and prevent potential errors when fetching track information.
Background Playback:

The extension ensures smooth background playback using offscreen documents, allowing uninterrupted listening even when the popup is closed.
User Notifications:

Notifications are triggered for new tracks, ensuring users stay updated about whatâ€™s currently playing.
Advantages:
User-Friendly Interface:

The extension offers a compact and intuitive UI with clear buttons and visual feedback.
Its minimalistic design ensures that users can easily control playback, switch streams, and search for tracks without any confusion.
Real-Time Track Information:

Users always know what track is playing without the need to visit external websites.
Versatile Search Options:

Direct integration with multiple platforms makes it easy for users to explore more music, discover artists, or find lyrics.
Personalized Experience:

The volume control and stream selection are saved, providing a personalized experience every time the extension is used.
Background Functionality:

The background playback ensures that the music continues even when the extension interface is closed, improving multitasking capabilities.
Lightweight and Efficient:

The extension is optimized to run smoothly without consuming excess resources, ensuring high performance and stability.
Overall, Radio 4YOU is a feature-rich and user-friendly Chrome extension tailored for EDM enthusiasts who want a convenient and interactive way to listen to their favorite radio station from their browser.
